metadata.name: Unique Progress Bar Icon
metadata.description:
[h1] THIS MOD REQUIRES REPENTOGON TO DOWNLOAD[/h1] [h2]CLICK [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3127536138&searchtext=REPENTOGON]HERE[/url] TO DOWNLOAD[/h2]
A neat little mod that automagically updates the Isaac icon on the stage transition screen to their co-op icon. The co-op icon actually originates from the one on this transition screen, turns out. It even works with modded characters! If a modded character does not have a co-op icon, it will revert to the default Isaac icon.
For local coders, there's even a few API options. See below: [code] ---Global UniqueProgressBarIcon
---Functions
---Offset the Y position of an icon for a specific PlayerType. ---@param playerType PlayerType ---@param offset integer function UniqueProgressBarIcon.AddIconYOffset(playerType, offset)
---Set a different icon to use for a specific PlayerType instead of their default co-op icon. Set the anm2 file it needs to play and its respective animation. ---@param playerType PlayerType ---@param anm2 string ---@param animation string function UniqueProgressBarIcon.SetIcon(playerType, anm2, animation)
---Reset the icon set by UniqueProgressBarIcon.SetIcon() ---@param playerType PlayerType function UniqueProgressBarIcon.ResetIcon(playerType) [/code]
